attributes.action: Ask David Cameron to debate on live TV with Nigel Farage 'EU , remain or leave'.
attributes.background: There is very little debate on TV regarding both sides of the EU argument.Two experts giving both sides of 'this argument'will better inform the General Public,and so help them come to a decision on how to vote in the coming EU referendum.The British Public deserve an open and transparent debate.

rejection.details: It would be for the broadcasters to decide whether to broadcast this debate, and for Mr Farage to decide whether he wanted to take part.
